title: 전치사+관계대명사 심화
description: 매우 격식 있는 문장에서만 볼 수 있는 구조를 연습합니다.
examples: The principles on which our company was founded remain unchanged.
The person to whom I was speaking is the department head.
The project for which we received funding has been completed successfully.
learning_points: 전치사+관계대명사 구조를 통한 격식 있는 문어체 표현

sentences.kr: 우리 회사가 설립된 원칙들은 변하지 않고 있다.
sentences.en: The principles on which our company was founded remain unchanged.
The person to whom I was speaking is the department head.

sentences.kr: 우리가 자금을 지원받은 프로젝트가 성공적으로 완료되었다.
sentences.en: The project for which we received funding has been completed successfully.

sentences.kr: 그들이 의존하고 있는 시스템이 곧 업그레이드될 예정이다.
sentences.en: The system on which they depend is scheduled to be upgraded soon.

sentences.kr: 우리가 논의한 문제들이 해결책을 찾기 어려운 것들이었다.
sentences.en: The issues about which we discussed were difficult to find solutions for.

sentences.kr: 그가 참조하고 있던 문서가 더 이상 유효하지 않다.
sentences.en: The document to which he was referring is no longer valid.

sentences.kr: 연구가 기반하고 있는 이론들이 최근에 재검토되고 있다.
sentences.en: The theories upon which the research is based are being reexamined recently.

sentences.kr: 계약이 체결된 조건들이 양측 모두에게 유리하다.
sentences.en: The conditions under which the contract was signed are favorable to both parties.
